languages.text: {n}Мейв ахает. Затем дрожащими руками снимает с себя колье и с реверансом передает его вам.{/n} "Это щедрый подарок господина Руолдо... осколок тассерция — редкого кристалла, которым славна наша планета. Воистину, такого дара более досто{mf|ен|йна} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..."

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Это щедрый подарок господина Руолдо, осколок сапфириона — редкого кристалла, которым славна наша планета".

languages.text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв ахает. Затем дрожащими руками снимает с себя колье и с реверансом передает его вам.{/n} "Это щедрый подарок господина Руолдо... осколок тассерция — редкого кристалла, которым славна наша планета. Воистину, такого дара более досто{mf|ен|йна} Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}..."

languages.text: {n}梅芙喘息着，用颤抖的双手摘下了项链，向你行了个屈膝礼。{/n}“这条项链是罗尔多领主的慷慨礼物……这块宝石是塔瑟拉水晶，是源自这颗行星的稀有水晶。您说得没错，来自上界的大人更配得上这样的礼物……”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙喘息着，用颤抖的双手摘下了项链，向你行了个屈膝礼。{/n}“这条项链是罗尔多领主的慷慨礼物……这块宝石是塔瑟拉水晶，是源自这颗行星的稀有水晶。您说得没错，来自上界的大人更配得上这样的礼物……”

languages.text: {n}メイヴは息を呑んだ。震える手で首飾りを外し、丁寧にお辞儀をして差し出した。{/n}「ルオルド様が寛大にも私にくださったものです…この石はタッセリウムの欠片―この惑星が誇る希少な水晶です。確かに、このような贈り物は天の{mf|君|姫}にこそふさわしいです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは息を呑んだ。震える手で首飾りを外し、丁寧にお辞儀をして差し出した。{/n}「ルオルド様が寛大にも私にくださったものです…この石はタッセリウムの欠片―この惑星が誇る希少な水晶です。確かに、このような贈り物は天の{mf|君|姫}にこそふさわしいです…」

languages.text: {n}Maive da un respingo. Se quita el collar con manos temblorosas y te lo ofrece con una reverencia.{/n} «Mi señor Ruoldo tuvo la generosidad de regalármelo... La piedra es un fragmento de thassertio, un cristal muy poco común que da fama a nuestro planeta. Verdaderamente mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial es más {mf|digno|digna} de tal obsequio...».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive da un respingo. Se quita el collar con manos temblorosas y te lo ofrece con una reverencia.{/n} «Mi señor Ruoldo tuvo la generosidad de regalármelo... La piedra es un fragmento de thassertio, un cristal muy poco común que da fama a nuestro planeta. Verdaderamente mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial es más {mf|digno|digna} de tal obsequio...».

languages.text: {n}Maive'in nefesi kesiliyor. Titreyen elleriyle kolyesini çıkarıp reverans eşliğinde sana sunuyor.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo'nun cömert hediyesiydi... Bu taş, gezegenimizle bağdaştırılan ender kristal tasertiyumdur. Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gerçekten de böylesi bir hediyeyi daha çok hak ediyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive'in nefesi kesiliyor. Titreyen elleriyle kolyesini çıkarıp reverans eşliğinde sana sunuyor.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo'nun cömert hediyesiydi... Bu taş, gezegenimizle bağdaştırılan ender kristal tasertiyumdur. Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gerçekten de böylesi bir hediyeyi daha çok hak ediyor..."

languages.text: {n}Maive hoquette, puis retire son collier de ses mains tremblantes avant de vous l'offrir dans une révérence.{/n} « Le seigneur Ruoldo m'en a généreusement fait cadeau... Cette pierre est un éclat de thassertium, un cristal rare qui fait la réputation de notre planète. Votre Céleste Seigneurie est bien plus digne que moi d'un tel présent... »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive hoquette, puis retire son collier de ses mains tremblantes avant de vous l'offrir dans une révérence.{/n} « Le seigneur Ruoldo m'en a généreusement fait cadeau... Cette pierre est un éclat de thassertium, un cristal rare qui fait la réputation de notre planète. Votre Céleste Seigneurie est bien plus digne que moi d'un tel présent... »

languages.text: {n}Maive keucht. Mit zitternden Händen nimmt sie ihre Halskette ab und reicht sie dir mit einem höfischen Knicks.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo gab sie mir in seiner Großzügigkeit ... Dieser Stein ist ein Thassertim ... das seltene Kristall, für das unser Planet berühmt ist. Und in der Tat verdient {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} ein solches Geschenk mehr als ich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Maive gasps. With trembling hands, she removes her necklace and offers it to you with a curtsy.{/n} "Lord Ruoldo generously gave it to me... This stone is a thassertium shard — the rare crystal our planet is famed for. Truly, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} is more deserving of such a gift..."
